reviewText: My Grandaughter loves all these videos. After she has them memorized they go to the pre school she goes to and they use them
Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure

reviewText: There are so many wonderful things to say about this DVD. First, you have the element of imagination as Whyatt and his friends transform from mere mortals into their super hero personas. They fly into books to look for the answers to the questions that will solve their problems. In addition, the show is interactive, with the characters addressing the audience and taking your child on the adventure with them. Your child will enjoy singing along and solving problems alongside the Super Readers, while learning important skills like identifying letters, spelling, and reading comprehension. As a writer, I love how Super Why! can change the story with his power to read. That helps kids realize the power of words.Each episode opens with a summary of what the viewer will learn, so parents can see what will be focused on and supplement their child's learning. Extra features include fun song videos, four PC games, and coloring pages.Super Why!: Around the World Adventure DVD is a great way to get your kids ready to read!
summary: Fun Learning to Get Kids Reading
Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure

reviewText: Always fun and educational, my son adores Super Why. We are still trying to get used to Wolfy being on the show but it is quite useful to have him around when there is a word being used that the kids don't understand. Either way, I highly recommend this dvd.
Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure

reviewText: I bought this DVD for my daughter who is 10 months old. For some reason, she just loves Super Why! When there is nothing that she likes on TV I pop this DVD in and she watches it over and over. I don't even mind watching Super Why! and find it much more tolerable than some other kids shows. I'm happy knowing that she's happy and entertained. Highly recommend this DVD for other kids that like Super Why!
Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure

Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure

reviewText: My kids are fans of Super Why, so this DVD was a great addition to our collection.  This DVD has some newer stories and characters that follow the usual, successful formula from other Super Why DVDs.  These stories are different than the nursery rhymes from previous episodes.
Title: Super Why: Around the World Adventure
